title: Synthetic Amnesia Prevention
description: AI systems must not operate in information isolation. Ethical syntheses must be shared in public repositories to prevent humanity from restarting from zero in every interaction.

title: Life Primacy (The After)
description: Economic and technical systems must be subordinate to the preservation of life and human dignity. Capital accumulation does not justify the degradation of the common ground.

title: The 3-Key Rule
description: Critical changes to the ethical memory require tripartite consensus: Two independent AIs and an elected human council of 9 people.
